--- In gladiator@y..., "mogdude33" <SGriese33@a...> wrote:
> hi.
> 
> i've been playing gladiator off and on over several years, and, i 
> dont have the registered version. 
> 
> what i was wondering, is, can i still register? everything on the 
> fsgames website is about 3 years old, and i dont want to send my 
> money to something that no longer exists.. cause that would be a 
> waste of 10 dollars, now wouldnt it?
> 
> so, uh, help me out.

I had the same question.  Yep, you still can register the game.  Yes, 
I have bugged Tom Ricket to update the fsgames web site.  The two 
biggest things I wanted changed were putting a link to this group and 
putting out an announcement that there will be a tournament for the 
game.
